reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: We have multiple dimmer switches on one panel and one of them was not working well...it was 30 years old. I did not want to replace all three as the other two still work great. However, I was unable to find this style in any of the local home improvement stores. I turned to Amazon and there it was! It came with multiple knobs to match the color of the existing ones, and the replacement is almost perfect. This controls multiple recessed LED lights and does so perfectly. No flickering at all!
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2025
reviews.title: Unable to find this style anywhere

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: Works fine on LED lights. We had an older dimmer that was prematurely burning out our LED spots in cans. I told the boss that the dimmer probably was the cause, so we changed it to this dimmer instead. The dimming action is much smoother with the Leviton. The old one used to jump around and get bright and and there was little control over dimming. This dimmer returns fine dimming control and I think it's much easier on the LED lights since it's purposefully designed for CFL and LED lights. I like that this came with three different trim knobs for different colors of ivory, since it's always difficult to match the wall plate color based on a photo. I was able to match the wall plate color perfectly. One criticism, though, the knob sticks out from the wall plate a little more pronounced than the old dimmer did. I think this is caused by the fact this is a "punch on-off" design rather than a "turn clockwise to turn on" design. The unit can handle SPST, 3 Way and 4 way wiring, too, so it's versatile.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on October 25, 2024
reviews.title: Works on LED lights

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: After obtaining the model number for our 30-year old dimmer from Leviton, we bought this same model hoping we could use just the knob to replace our broken knob without paying an electrician to change the entire unit. Our old knob's post requires an open circle shape, and this newer model's post hole is D shaped.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2020
reviews.title: The dimmer knob does not fit older RDL06-10Z models with circular posts. This is D shaped.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: A rotary dimmer, in my professional opinion, is the easiest to operate. Many dimmers require you to push, slide, hold, and generally make love to it to operate your lights. The rotary is quick and easy to operate. Another advantage is that it uses a standard, old-fashioned switch plate, as opposed to a Decora-style plate with the large rectangular opening. This may not be big deal, until you start putting multiple switches at one location. A three-gang switch box, for instance, where you have a combination of standard toggle switches and dimmers can be hard to find a plate with the configuration you need. Keep it simple. We only buy universal application, like this dimmer, because it does all types of bulbs and is either single or three-way. Can't beat it for simplicity and ease of customer use.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on June 7, 2019
reviews.title: Easy to operate and fits standard switch plate.

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: I used it for a BR40 65 Watt dimmable LED bulb. Although it works, it is poor are the lower levels of light and never can take the intensity to zero. It always stays lite at a dim level and when you turn the knob up it kind of flickers unit partially turned up. It appears the design still cannot eliminate the leakage to shut the bulb off completely. May because it is not designed just for LED's but tries to do both LED & Incandescence bulbs. Please design one for LED's only and maybe it would work better.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on March 17, 2019
reviews.title: Works OK but not great

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: This replaced the old 6683 version - just installed and works as expected. Needed the -10Z (which can be wired as a single switch or as a 3-way). I needed 3-way because of the switch across the room that turns the light on and off as well. I followed the wiring instructions - good to go. Hoping for longevity - time will tell.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2019
reviews.title: Works well - hoping for longevity

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: We're using it to dim LED's around the bathroom mirror. This won't dim them over the full range....it stops dimming when the lights are still plenty bright. I'm an engineer so of course I know everything ;) Seriously, I've designed light dimmers and motor speed controls many times and I know exactly what is wrong with the design. These should be designed with a tiny microprocessor which checks the current through the wires periodically and calibrates the half-cycle ramp. If Leviton wants to pay me, I'll design one that does that. It wouldn't add but a few cents to the cost.
reviews.date: Reviewed in the United States on December 15, 2017
reviews.title: Doesn't dim all the way

reviews.productTitle: Leviton Trimatron Rotary Dimmer Switch for Dimmable LED, Halogen and Incandescent Bulbs, RDL06-10Z, White
reviews.text: This switch was easy to install and came as advertised with two different buttons. We used it to replace one that looked just like it in a 3-way installation and it works well. It does hum a bit when dimmed to 50% or less but it is only noticeable if your standing right next to it.
reviews.date: Reviewed in Canada on February 3, 2023
reviews.title: Works Great - Easy to Install
